data.eml:eml: A new species of Brycon (Characiformes: Characidae) from Nicaragua and Costa Rica, with a key to the lower Mesoamerican species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Angulo, Arturo, Gracian-Negrete, Jatziry Marlene (2013): A new species of Brycon (Characiformes: Characidae) from Nicaragua and Costa Rica, with a key to the lower Mesoamerican species of the genus. Zootaxa 3731 (2): 255-266, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3731.2.6
